items.name: Sarah M.
items.text: FlickAI's offline mode saved me during a client trip when I had no Wi-Fi. The OCR accuracy is impressive, and the free tier is genuinely useful. I've saved hours on expense tracking.

items.name: James R.
items.text: As someone who travels frequently, the offline functionality is essential. FlickAI works perfectly on planes and in remote locations. The privacy-first approach also gives me peace of mind with client-sensitive expenses.

items.name: Alex T.

faq.q2: Is there an expense tracker without bank sync?

faq.q5: Can I export my expenses to Excel/CSV?
